## redux-observable-state package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createObservable](./redux-observable-state.createobservable.md) | Creates the Redux middleware and the RxJS observable. |
|  [current](./redux-observable-state.current.md) | An RxJS pipe that selects the current state. |
|  [select](./redux-observable-state.select.md) | An RxJS pipe that returns a part of the state. |
